code: export var localStorageSet=function localStorageSet(key,value){return localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(value));};export var localStorageGet=function localStorageGet(key,defaultValue){var data=defaultValue;try{data=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(key));}catch(err){console.warn(err===null||err===void 0?void 0:err.message);}return data||defaultValue;};export var localStorageRemove=function localStorageRemove(key){return localStorage.removeItem(key);};
